title: The Duality of Jean
description: Guest Bailiff Jean Grae returns to The Court to clear the docket! Spring is here. We've got (spring) cleaning disputes, cases about flowers, and seasonal allergy related sneezing!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
